creator: thomas2.maesing@bgs-ag.de
text:
Hi,
I have found a problem with referencing attribute Groups in imported 
namespaces. Such references do not work. For the statement         
<xsd:extension base ="ssregw:DocumentType">
          <xsd:attribute name="data" type="xsd:string" fixed="DocumentType"/>
          <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:string"/>
	  <xsd:attributeGroup ref="general:SimpleLink"/>
        </xsd:extension>
I get the following errormessage "defaultresult.xml:
[Error] defaultresult.xml:2:277: Attribute "general:href" must be declared for 
element type "ssregw:DocumentType"." for this part of the source document:
<ssregw:DocumentType general:href="test.html">501</ssregw:DocumentType>.

A similar Statement for elements (e.g. <xsd:element ref="general:BirthName" 
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>) works fine.

I think this feature is very important. For example it is necessary for using
xlink with XML Schema. Trying this I found the problem.

If you need the complete example files please ask for them and I will send them.

Best regards

Thomas

I've applied a fix to CVS which solved another problem which appears to be very 
closely related (perhaps identical to) this one.  If this fix doesn't solve 
your problem, please supply a set of files that demonstrates the problem and 
that is as concise as possible.
